My Expertise

I am a Digital Media and Communication researcher, working especially with data analysis and visualization to get insights from online platforms and social media. Here are some of my projects. Feel free to take a look around.

Design

HTML and CSS for creating beautiful websites and pages.

Code

Python and JavaScript for data analisys and web programming.

Tools

Git and Atom to make my life a little bit easier.

Featured Projects

TwitData

TwitData is a simple web application that geolocates tweets on a map - wether you search by user, hashtag or trending topics. It’s a simple and fast way to find out what user are talking about somewhere - or where they are talking about something.

Check it out

YouTube Data

YouTube Data is a web application to make simple data collections as visualizations via the YouTube API, showing what videos are more recommended for a specific search query. It also has a networks analisys function that don't require downloading the data.

Check it out

Puppybot

Puppybot is a Twitter bot that retweets images of puppies! It can filter ugly images (like pictures of cats, for instance) using TensorFlow. It was developed using Python.
